meanings.definition: Situated or occurring beneath the epidermis.
meanings.sent1: The subepidermal layer provides support to the skin above.
meanings.sent2: Dermatologists study the subepidermal structures for skin health.
meanings.sent3: The subepidermal region decided to throw a surprise party for the epidermis.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a subepidermal layer, always present but not always visible.
meanings.sent5: The subepidermal depth of the ocean held mysteries waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: Located below the outermost layer of skin.
meanings.sent1: The subepidermal tissues play a crucial role in skin protection.
meanings.sent2: Proper hydration is essential for maintaining the subepidermal barrier.
meanings.sent3: The subepidermal area was the perfect hiding spot for the tiny bug.
meanings.sent4: His determination ran deep, like a subepidermal layer of resilience.
meanings.sent5: The subepidermal shield shielded the skin from harmful UV rays.
